short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Monitor Chrome downloads, collect user identity, send to Webhooke for logging. No data sent without URL.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension listen to Google Chrome file download events, it's collecting the User Identity email and the file download url and send the info Webhook for configured in Google Workspace for logging and security investigation. The extension not sending any data without the destination url to keep privacy
